data.HEADER: Brukerinfo - a web interface to Cerebrum
data.FOOTER: Brukerinfo - a web interface to Cerebrum
data.ACTION_DELAY: Changes will be applied within %d minutes.
data.ERROR_BOFH_CONNECTION: Could not connect to the database, please try again later.
data.ERROR_BOFH_ERROR: Error in the communication with the database, please try again later.
data.ERROR_BOFH_RESTARTED: The database has been restarted, please update the page or log on again.
data.LOGON_INTRO:
This is a web based user interface for Cerebrum you can use to view and modify some of the information concerning your web identity and account at the University of Oslo. For more information and help, please see the help pages.

If you have more than one username, please log on with the username and password for the account you want to view or modify.

For security reasons, the username and password entered on this web page will be encrypted when transfered to the server. Normally, you should not enter username and password information on a webpage, but you can read about why it is OK in this case by going to this webpage.
data.LOGON_BLOCKED: Too many logon attempts, you have been temporary blocked from this site
data.LOGON_TIMED_OUT: This session has timed out after a period of inactivity. Please log on again.
data.LOGON_CONTROL_FAILED: Due to safety reasons, you have to log on again.
data.HOME_SPECIFIC_ACCOUNT: Please note that you can only make changes to the account '%s'. If you need to make changes to another account, please log on with the appropriate username and password.
data.HOME_SHORTCUTS_MEMBERS: Add or remove members from your group(s)
data.HOME_ABOUT: This is a web based user interface you can use to view and modify some of the information concerning your electronic identity at the University of Oslo. For more information and help about data systems at UiO, please see IT-services at UiO.
data.PERSON_HOWTO_CHANGE_FS: If information in Felles Studentsystem (FS) is wrong, please contact your student office.
data.PERSON_HOWTO_CHANGE_SAP: If information in SAP is wrong, please contact SAPUiO.
data.ACCOUNT_OTHER_INFO: For information about your other accounts, please log on with the appropiate username and password.
data.ACCOUNT_PASSWORD_INTRO:
Change the password of the account you are logged on to. Please note that your password is personal and must never be shared with anyone else, not even the IT staff at UiO.

This is a summary of the requirements, see all password requirements when in doubt.

A password must:

  • Be at least 8 characters long
  • Contain characters from at least 3 of 4 of these categories:
    • Numbers
    • Lowercase letters
    • Uppercase letters
    • Other characters
The password must not:
  • Contain æ, ø or å
  • Contain words found in a dictionary
  • Resemble one of your previous set password
data.ACCOUNT_PASSWORD_ERROR_MATCH: The new password does not match with the retype.
data.ACCOUNT_PASSWORD_MOREINFO: View more information about the username and password at UiO.
data.ACCOUNT_PRIMARY_INTRO:
If you have more than one account at UiO, one of the accounts is the primary account. Please be aware of the following:
  • Feide accepts only your primary account
  • Fronter (blyant.uio.no) accepts only your primary account
data.ACCOUNT_PRIMARY_ALREADY:
The active account (%s) is already your primary account.
To make another account the primary, please log on with that account.
data.ACCOUNT_PRIMARY_SUCCESS: Your account %s is now your primary account. It normally takes up to up to 2 hours before changes are applied.
data.ACCOUNT_PRIMARY_FAILED: The system could not change your primary account, please contact your local IT support service or Houston
data.PRINTING_MOREINFO_PAY: To pay for more prints, please log on to StudentWeb at UiO.
data.PRINTING_MOREINFO_PRICES: For more information about the printout prices, see kopiavgiften at UiO.
data.PRINTING_MOREINFO_PRINTING: For more information about printing and printers, please visit the page for printing services at UiO
data.PRINTING_HISTORY_EMPTY: Found no quota history for given period. You may need to extend the range.
data.EMAIL_INFO_MORE_INFO: For more information about UiOs e-mail system please see the e-mail help pages.
data.EMAIL_SPAM_INTRO: These settings are applied before your e-mails are delivered to your mailbox. For more information please see USIT's page about spam.
data.EMAIL_SPAM_RULE_ACTION_REQUIRED: Please choose what to do with your spam
data.EMAIL_FILTER_INTRO: Additional spam settings are extra tools for decreasing the amount of spam you receive. Remember to also set your standard spam settings. For more information please see USIT's page about spam.
data.EMAIL_FILTER_UPDATE_SUCCESS: Your additional spam settings have been updated
data.EMAIL_FILTER_GREYLIST_DESC: Please see USIT's page about greylist for more information.
data.EMAIL_FILTER_UIOONLY_DESC: Please see USIT's page about UiOonly for more information.
data.EMAIL_TRIPNOTE_INTRO: Out of office messages (vacation messages) are automatic replies to all e-mails sent to you in a set period of time. Each sender will receive the message only once. For more information please see USIT's page about this.
data.EMAIL_TRIPNOTE_NEW_SUCCESS: New Out of office message added
data.EMAIL_TRIPNOTE_DELETE_TITLE: Confirm deleting Out of office message
data.EMAIL_TRIPNOTE_DELETE_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to delete the following Out of office message?
data.EMAIL_FORWARD_INTRO: You can forward all your incoming e-mails to another e-mail address. Please note that for security reasons this is not recommended. For more information please see USIT's page about forwarding.
data.EMAIL_FORWARD_NEW_OK: A new forwarding has been made. It normally takes up to 2 hours before changes are applied.
data.EMAIL_FORWARD_DELAY: It normally takes up to %d minutes before changes are applied.
data.EMAIL_FORWARD_DELETE_CONFIRM_INTRO: Are you sure you want to delete your forwarding to %s?
data.EMAIL_FORWARD_ADDLOCAL: Your account is now forwarding all your emails to another email address. Do you want to keep a copy of these emails in this UiO email account?
data.EMAIL_FORWARD_FORM_ADDRESS: Forward all e-mails to this address:
data.EMAIL_FORWARD_FORM_KEEP: Keep a copy of all e-mails in your UiO mailbox
data.GROUPS_EMPTY_MOD_LIST: You have no groups to moderate, but you can make your own personal group.
data.GROUPS_TOO_MANY: You are a moderator of too many groups, which would take too long time to load. Please use the command line interface jbofh instead.
data.GROUPS_NO_PERSONAL: You do not have a personal group. Do you want to create it?
data.GROUPS_PERSONAL_INFO: The personal group is a group with the same name as your user account (in this case %s). You are the administrator of the group and decide who should be members with access to e.g. shared documents or allow execution of scripts.
data.GROUPS_PERSONAL_ALREADY: It looks like you already have a personal group
data.GROUPS_PERSONAL_SUCCESS: Created your personal group. It normally takes up to 2 hours before changes are applied.
data.GROUPS_MEMBERS_DEL_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to remove the following members from the group %s?
data.GROUPS_MEMBERS_CHOOSE: Which group do you want to manage?
data.GROUPS_MEMBERS_ADDED_SUCCESS: Added new members to the group
data.GROUPS_MEMBERS_LIST_EMPTY: This group has currently no members
data.GROUPS_MEMBERS_TOO_MANY: This group has too many members to be shown here. Please user jbofh or contact your local IT-service.
data.GROUPS_MEMBERS_MORE: To add more members, separate them with spaces or commas.
data.BOFH_INFO_AFFILIATIONS: Your account has the following affiliation(s):
data.BOFH_INFO_PERSON_AFFILIATIONS: Your person has the following affiliation(s):
data.BOFH_INFO_SPREADS: Your account is active in the following system(s):
